user.title: Choose Log Export Backend
user.description: Select how you want to export Home Assistant system logs.

otel.title: Configure OTLP Endpoint
otel.description: Enter the connection details for your OpenTelemetry collector.

data_description.host: Hostname or IP address of the OTLP collector.
data_description.port: HTTP port of the OTLP collector (default 4318).
data_description.use_tls: Enable HTTPS for the connection to the collector.
data_description.encoding: Encoding format for the OTLP payload: json or protobuf.
data_description.batch_max_size: Maximum number of log records to buffer before flushing (1-10000, default 100).
data_description.resource_attributes: Optional comma-separated key=value pairs added to every log record (e.g. deployment.environment=production,service.namespace=home).
data_description.bearer_token: Optional bearer token. Sent as 'Authorization: Bearer ...' header.
data_description.headers: Optional extra HTTP headers, one per line in 'Name: value' format (e.g. stream-name: my-stream).
data_description.path: Path appended to host:port for the logs endpoint (default /v1/logs). Prefix with any API-specific path (e.g. /api/otlp/v1/logs).

reauth_otel.title: Re-authenticate OTLP Endpoint
reauth_otel.description: Authentication failed. Enter a new bearer token.

data_description.bearer_token: New bearer token to authenticate with the OTLP collector.

syslog.title: Configure Syslog Endpoint
syslog.description: Enter the connection details for your RFC 5424 syslog server.

data_description.host: Hostname or IP address of the syslog server.
data_description.protocol: Transport protocol: UDP (fire-and-forget) or TCP (reliable delivery).
data_description.use_tls: Enable TLS encryption for TCP connections. Ignored for UDP.
data_description.app_name: The APP-NAME field in RFC 5424 messages (default: homeassistant).
data_description.facility: Syslog facility code used to calculate the PRI value (default: user).

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to the endpoint. Verify the host, port, and TLS settings.
error.invalid_attributes: Invalid format. Use comma-separated key=value pairs (e.g. env=prod,region=us).
error.invalid_headers: Invalid format. Use one 'Name: value' header per line.
error.invalid_auth: Authentication failed. Check the bearer token.
